memberdef.argsstring: (byte[] publicKey, RsaPaddingMode paddingMode, ILogger< RsaCryptographyService > logger, byte[]? privateKey=null)
memberdef.name: RsaCryptographyService

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of the RsaCryptographyService class using raw key bytes.

parameterdescription.para: The public key in SubjectPublicKeyInfo format.
The padding mode to use for encryption/decryption.
The logger instance.
The private key in PKCS#8 format, or null if decryption is not needed.
Thrown when publicKey or logger is null.
Thrown when the key format is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (X509Certificate2 certificate, RsaPaddingMode paddingMode, ILogger< RsaCryptographyService > logger)
memberdef.name: RsaCryptographyService

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of the RsaCryptographyService class using an X.509 certificate.

parameterdescription.para: The X.509 certificate containing the RSA key(s).
The padding mode to use for encryption/decryption.
The logger instance.
Thrown when certificate or logger is null.
Thrown when the certificate does not contain an RSA key.
The text to encrypt.
Thrown when plainText is null.
Thrown when encryption fails.

detaileddescription.para: RSA can only encrypt data smaller than the key size minus padding overhead. For larger data, consider using hybrid encryption (RSA + AES).

para.para: Asynchronously encrypts the specified plain text.

parameterdescription.para: The text to encrypt.
A token to cancel the operation.

simplesect.para: A task containing the encrypted text.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when plainText is null.
The text to decrypt.
Thrown when encryptedText is null.
Thrown when the encrypted text format is invalid.
Thrown when private key is not available.
Thrown when decryption fails due to invalid data.

para.para: Asynchronously decrypts the specified encrypted text.

parameterdescription.para: The text to decrypt.
A token to cancel the operation.

simplesect.para: A task containing the decrypted plain text.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when encryptedText is null.
Thrown when the encrypted text format is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Generates a new RSA key pair.

parameterdescription.para: The key size to generate.
Whether to include the private key in the result.

simplesect.para: An RsaKeyPair containing the generated keys.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when keySize is not a valid RSA key size.

briefdescription.para: Generates a new RSA key pair.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to include the private key in the result.

simplesect.para: An RsaKeyPair containing the generated keys.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when keySize is not valid.

memberdef.argsstring: (RsaKeySize keySize, string subjectName, TimeSpan validityPeriod, bool includePrivateKey=true)
memberdef.name: GenerateCertificate

briefdescription.para: Generates a self-signed X.509 certificate containing an RSA key pair.

parameterdescription.para: The key size to generate.
The certificate subject name (e.g., "CN=MyApp").
The certificate validity period.
Whether to include the private key in the certificate.

simplesect.para: An RsaKeyPair containing the generated certificate.

parameterdescription.para: Thrown when subjectName is null.
Thrown when keySize is not valid.

memberdef.argsstring: (int keySize, string subjectName, TimeSpan validityPeriod, bool includePrivateKey=true)
memberdef.name: GenerateCertificate

briefdescription.para: Generates a self-signed X.509 certificate containing an RSA key pair.

parameterdescription.para: The key size in bits.
The certificate subject name.
The certificate validity period.
Whether to include the private key in the certificate.

simplesect.para: An RsaKeyPair containing the generated certificate.

parameterdescription.para: A CancellationToken that can be used to cancel the disposal operation.

simplesect.para: A ValueTask representing the asynchronous operation.

para.para: Override this method to release async resources such as streams, database connections, or other async-disposable objects.

briefdescription.para: Converts the RsaPaddingMode enum to RSAEncryptionPadding.

parameterdescription.para: The padding mode enum value.

briefdescription.para: Validates that the key size is valid for RSA.

parameterdescription.para: The key size in bits.
Thrown when the key size is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Gets the maximum data length that can be encrypted with the current key and padding.

simplesect.para: The maximum number of bytes that can be encrypted.

briefdescription.para: Cryptography service implementation using RSA asymmetric encryption.

detaileddescription.para: This service provides secure text encryption and decryption using the RSA algorithm. It supports various key sizes and padding modes.
Encryption requires only the public key, while decryption requires the private key.
The encrypted output is Base64-encoded for safe text transmission.
